vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.14.50;
son of: Abiel (H0022) and Maacah (H4601N);
brother of: Kish (H7027), Abdon (H5658J), Zur (H6698I), Baal (H1168B), Nadab (H5070J), Gedor (H1446I), Ahio (H0283I), Zecher (H2144) and Mikloth (H4732);
father of: Abner (H0074)
§ Ner = "lamp"
1) son of Jehiel, father of Kish, and grandfather of king Saul
2) father of Abner, the uncle of Saul
2a) perhaps the same as 1
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1)   lámpara; (2)   abuelo de rey Saúl; padre de Abner; tribu de Benjamín
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
尼珥 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "燈"
1) 耶利的兒子, 基士的父親, 掃羅的祖父 (代上 9:35-36,39)
2) 押尼珥的父親, 掃羅的叔叔 (撒上 14:50)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
尼珥 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "灯"
1) 耶利的儿子, 基士的父亲, 扫罗的祖父 (代上 9:35-36,39)
2) 押尼珥的父亲, 扫罗的叔叔 (撒上 14:50)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.9.1;
son of: Zeror (H6872C); married to Maacah (H4601N);
father of: Kish (H7027), Ner (H5369), Abdon (H5658J), Zur (H6698I), Baal (H1168B), Nadab (H5070J), Gedor (H1446I), Ahio (H0283I), Zecher (H2144) and Mikloth (H4732); also called Jeiel (Ketiv: Jeuel; KJV: Jehiel) at 1Ch.9.35; Ner at 1Ch.8.33; 9.39;
Another name of a.vi.el (אֲבִיאֵל "Abiel" H0022)
§ Ner = "lamp"
1) son of Jehiel, father of Kish, and grandfather of king Saul
2) father of Abner, the uncle of Saul
2a) perhaps the same as 1
